CustomField.formula: If(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), "Contract", If(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "Existing Business - Internal Transfer"), "Contract", IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer"), "Contract", IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "New Business - Expansion Portal"), "Contract", If(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "Existing Business-Professional Services"), "Upsell", If(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "Existing Business-Upsell"),"Upsell", If(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "Existing Business-Renewal"),"Contract","")))))))
CustomField.label: Opportunity Contract/Upsell
